item.title: Showing result suggestions in a WinRT SearchBox: bug regarding the image
item.description: Today I ran into a strange problem that made me waste an hour or two, so I thought Iâ€™d write about it in case someone else faces the same issue. The SearchBox control was introduced in Windows 8.1 to enable search scenarios from within a Windows Store app. One of its features is that it can show suggestions based on user input. There are three kinds of suggestions: History suggestions are search queries previously entered by the user.
